verses.verse: There was a man <S%H376><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Uz <S%H5780><s%>, whose name <S%H8034><s%> was Job <S%H347><s%>; and that man <S%H376><s%> was perfect <S%H8535><s%> and upright <S%H3477><s%>, and one that feared <S%H3373><s%> God <S%H430><s%>, and turned away from <S%H5493><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%>.
And there were born <S%H3205><s%> unto him seven <S%H7651><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> and three <S%H7969><s%> daughters <S%H1323><s%>.

His substance <S%H4735><s%> also was seven <S%H7651><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> sheep <S%H6629><s%>, and three <S%H7969><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> camels <S%H1581><s%>, and five <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> yoke <S%H6776><s%> of oxen <S%H1241><s%>, and five <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> she donkeys <S%H860><s%>, and a very <S%H3966><s%> great <S%H7227><s%> household <S%H5657><s%>; so that this man <S%H376><s%> was the greatest <S%H1419><s%> of all the men <S%H1121><s%> of the east <S%H6924><s%>.

And his sons <S%H1121><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> and feasted <S%H4960><s%> in their houses <S%H1004><s%>, every one <S%H376><s%> his day <S%H3117><s%>; and sent <S%H7971><s%> and called <S%H7121><s%> for their three <S%H7969><s%> sisters <S%H269><s%> to eat <S%H398><s%> and to drink with them <S%H8354><s%>.

And it was so <S%H3117><s%>, when the days of their feasting <S%H4960><s%> were gone about <S%H5362><s%>, that Job <S%H347><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> and sanctified <S%H6942><s%> them <S%H7925><s%>, and rose up early in the morning <S%H1242><s%>, and offered <S%H5927><s%> burnt offerings <S%H5930><s%> according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of them all <S%H347><s%>: for Job said <S%H559><s%>, It may be <S%H194><s%> that my sons <S%H1121><s%> have sinned <S%H2398><s%>, and cursed <S%H1288><s%> God <S%H430><s%> in their hearts <S%H3824><s%>. Thus did <S%H6213><s%> Job <S%H347><s%> continually <S%H3117><s%>.

Now there was a day <S%H3117><s%> when the sons <S%H1121><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to present <S%H3320><s%> themselves before the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, and Satan <S%H7854><s%> came <S%H935><s%> also among them <S%H8432><s%>.

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Satan <S%H7854><s%>, From where <S%H370><s%> come <S%H935><s%> you <S%H7854><s%>? Then Satan answered <S%H6030><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, From going to and forth <S%H7751><s%> in the earth <S%H776><s%>, and from walking up and down in it <S%H1980><s%>.

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Satan <S%H7854><s%>, Have you considered <S%H7760><s%> my servant <S%H5650><s%> Job <S%H347><s%>, that there is none like him in the earth <S%H776><s%>, a perfect <S%H8535><s%> and an upright <S%H3477><s%> man <S%H376><s%>, one that fears <S%H3373><s%> God <S%H430><s%>, and turns away from <S%H5493><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%>?
Then Satan <S%H7854><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, Does Job <S%H347><s%> fear <S%H3372><s%> God <S%H430><s%> for nothing <S%H2600><s%>?

Have not you made a hedge <S%H7753><s%> about him <S%H1157><s%>, and about his house <S%H1004><s%>, and about all that he has on every side <S%H5439><s%>? you have blessed <S%H1288><s%> the work <S%H4639><s%> of his hands <S%H3027><s%>, and his substance <S%H4735><s%> is increased <S%H6555><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%>.
But <S%H199><s%> put forth <S%H7971><s%> your hand <S%H3027><s%> now <S%H5060><s%>, and touch all that he has <S%H1288><s%>, and he will curse you to your face <S%H6440><s%>.

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Satan <S%H7854><s%>, Behold <S%H3027><s%>, all that he has is in your power; only upon himself put not forth <S%H7971><s%> your hand <S%H3027><s%>. So Satan <S%H7854><s%> went forth <S%H3318><s%> from the presence <S%H6440><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.

And there was a day <S%H3117><s%> when his sons <S%H1121><s%> and his daughters <S%H1323><s%> were eating <S%H398><s%> and drinking <S%H8354><s%> wine <S%H3196><s%> in their oldest <S%H1060><s%> brother <S%H251><s%>'s house <S%H1004><s%>:

And there came <S%H935><s%> a messenger <S%H4397><s%> unto Job <S%H347><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, The oxen <S%H1241><s%> were plowing <S%H2790><s%>, and the donkeys <S%H860><s%> feeding <S%H7462><s%> beside them <S%H3027><s%>:

And the Sabeans <S%H7614><s%> fell <S%H5307><s%> upon them <S%H3947><s%>, and took them away; Yes <S%H5221><s%>, they have slain the servants <S%H5288><s%> with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword <S%H2719><s%>; and I only am escaped <S%H4422><s%> alone to tell you <S%H5046><s%>.

While he was yet speaking <S%H1696><s%>, there came <S%H935><s%> also another <S%H559><s%>, and said, The fire <S%H784><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> is fallen <S%H5307><s%> from heaven <S%H8064><s%>, and has burned up <S%H1197><s%> the sheep <S%H6629><s%>, and the servants <S%H5288><s%>, and consumed <S%H398><s%> them <S%H4422><s%>; and I only am escaped alone to tell you <S%H5046><s%>.

While he was yet speaking <S%H1696><s%>, there came <S%H935><s%> also another <S%H559><s%>, and said, The Chaldeans <S%H3778><s%> made out <S%H7760><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> bands <S%H7218><s%>, and fell <S%H6584><s%> upon the camels <S%H1581><s%>, and have carried them away <S%H3947><s%>, Yes <S%H5221><s%>, and slain the servants <S%H5288><s%> with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword <S%H2719><s%>; and I only am escaped <S%H4422><s%> alone to tell you <S%H5046><s%>.

While he was yet speaking <S%H1696><s%>, there came <S%H935><s%> also another <S%H559><s%>, and said, Your sons <S%H1121><s%> and your daughters <S%H1323><s%> were eating <S%H398><s%> and drinking <S%H8354><s%> wine <S%H3196><s%> in their oldest <S%H1060><s%> brother <S%H251><s%>'s house <S%H1004><s%>:

And <S%H935><s%>, behold, there came a great <S%H1419><s%> wind <S%H7307><s%> from <S%H5676><s%> the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, and struck <S%H5060><s%> the four <S%H702><s%> corners <S%H6438><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%>, and it fell <S%H5307><s%> upon the young men <S%H5288><s%>, and they are dead <S%H4191><s%>; and I only am escaped <S%H4422><s%> alone to tell you <S%H5046><s%>.

Then Job <S%H347><s%> arose <S%H6965><s%>, and tore <S%H7167><s%> his mantle <S%H4598><s%>, and shaved <S%H1494><s%> his head <S%H7218><s%>, and fell down <S%H5307><s%> upon the ground <S%H776><s%>, and worshiped <S%H7812><s%>,

And said <S%H559><s%>, Naked <S%H6174><s%> came I out <S%H3318><s%> of my mother <S%H517><s%>'s womb <S%H990><s%>, and naked <S%H6174><s%> shall I return <S%H7725><s%> there <S%H3068><s%>: the Lord gave <S%H5414><s%>, and the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has taken away <S%H3947><s%>; blessed <S%H1288><s%> be the name <S%H8034><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.
In all this Job <S%H347><s%> sinned <S%H2398><s%> not <S%H5414><s%>, nor commanded God <S%H430><s%> foolishly <S%H8604><s%>.
